name: Deep Dish Delivery
description:
DEEP DISH DELIVERY Is a 2D sidescroller made for LD48! The goal of the game is to deliver a pizza to the owner of a haunted mansion, and not die along the way!

CONTROLS:

  • MOVE:     WASD
  • JUMP:      SPACE
  • ATTACK:       P
  • ROLL:            O
  • INTERACT:   E
  • EAT PIZZA:   T

PUZZLE SOLUTIONS:

  • Library: the small symbols on the back of the books show you the answer. The order is 1 line, 2 lines (=), 3 lines (triangle), 4 lines (square), 5 lines (pentagon), 6 lines (hexagon).
  • Dungeon: the pillars before the puzzle will tell you the order of buttons to press. The order is middle button (snake), left button (bat), right button (bird).
